ED_Title: Request for an advisory opinion of the International Court of Justice on the legal consequences of the separation of the Chagos Archipelago from Mauritius in 1965
ED_DecisionText: At its 102nd plenary meeting, on 8 September 2022, the General Assembly decided to defer consideration of the item entitled “Request for an advisory opinion of the International Court of Justice on the legal consequences of the separation of the Chagos Archipelago from Mauritius in 1965” and to include it in the draft agenda of its seventy-seventh session.
